mapper.select: select COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS user_count from access_stats
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS user_count FROM access_stats WHERE access_time >= CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 DAY AND access_time < CURDATE()
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS user_count FROM access_stats WHERE access_time >= CURDATE() - INTERVAL 7 DAY AND access_time < CURDATE()
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS user_count FROM access_stats WHERE access_time >= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 MONTH, '%Y-%m-01') AND access_time < DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01')
